vote.title: Authorize (1) a consulting services contract with Landry Consulting LLC to provide services for the performance of a Safety Management Systems (SMS) GAP analysis, SMS manual and SMS implementation, in accordance with the Federal Aviation Administration draft Advisory Circular 150/5200-37; and (2) an increase appropriations in an amount not to exceed $489,297.33 in the Aviation Passenger Facility Charge - Near Term Projects Fund - Not to exceed $489,297.33 - Financing: Aviation Passenger Facility Charge - Near Term Projects Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) a consulting services contract with Landry Consulting LLC to provide services for the performance of a Safety Management Systems (SMS) GAP analysis, SMS manual and SMS implementation, in accordance with the Federal Aviation Administration draft Advisory Circular 150/5200-37; and (2) an increase appropriations in an amount not to exceed $489,297.33 in the Aviation Passenger Facility Charge - Near Term Projects Fund - Not to exceed $489,297.33 - Financing: Aviation Passenger Facility Charge - Near Term Projects Fund
